title: missing ssw talon skin
body:
I received SSW talon over a year ago as a mystery gift. I never used talon much as I wasn't an assassin player.
I recently decided to play a few games on each assassin to test out their new kit and see how it worked, see if I liked them and how to counter them.
After several games on talon, I suddenly realized my pre-select of Samsung White talon was no longer being used, so the next champ select I sepcifically looked for it and it does not show up in my list of skins for talon..

please help, would like to make sure the skins I pay for are actually usable...

I already have tried a client repair and this did not fix it.

replies.body:
Since we'll need to take a look at what happened, I recommend reaching out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so one of our account specialists can assist you.

Let me know if you have any questions.
